IOGRUtil
Class BufferManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--IOGRUtil.BufferManager
public class BufferManager
extends Object

A BufferManager is used to share a pool of buffers and to implement a buffer allocation policy. This reduces the number of memory allocations and deallocations and the overall memory footprint.
